feed.title: Typography Three & Four
feed.subtitle: This is the curriculum web site for DSN1543 Typography 3 & DSN1540 Typography 4 courses in the Graphic Design program at Algonquin College in Ottawa, Canada.

entry.title: Need support? CAL is here to help!

link.title: Need support? CAL is here to help!

entry.content: If you find you’re struggling with your studies, the Centre for Accessible Learning is here to help. Once you register, you can talk to a counsellor, a learning strategist and more.
entry.summary: If you find you’re struggling with your studies, the Centre for Accessible Learning is here to help. Once you register, you can talk to a counsellor, a learning strategist and more.

entry.title: Struggling in a specific course?
entry.content:
If there’s a specific course in which you’re struggling, you can hire a peer tutor. Peer Tutoring Services matches students who are experiencing difficulties in a course with trained student tutors for one-on-one tutoring.

If there isn’t a peer tutor available for your particular course, please get in touch with Alain Paradis or David Bromley. We’ll do our best to find you someone.
